objects.text:
• 200MP Pro-Grade Camera
• 6.9" Dynamic AMOLED Display
• 12GB RAM + 512GB Storage
• 5000 mAh Battery

banner_details:
The banner is a tech product promotion layout divided into four quadrants with a futuristic and structured design. The top-left quadrant contains the bold product title (`heading`), a stylish subheading (`subheading`), and device specs (`tagline`). The top-right shows the product image (`product_image`) featuring the phone with the model name on its display. The bottom-left includes key feature highlights in bullet points (`description`). The bottom-right displays pricing (`price`) along with a prominent call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the label (`cta`). The background consists of deep blue tones, geometric overlays, and halo-effect circular accents behind the visuals for depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: `#0A192F`
- Royal Blue: `#0D2652`
- Azure Blue: `#4D9BF5`
- Slate Gray: `#B0C4DE`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of the Galaxy S25 Ultra showcases a modern, sleek aesthetic with a minimalist color palette that emphasizes elegance and sophistication. The dominant color is a soft metallic silver-blue (#D6DBE5), used consistently across the phone body and stylus, portraying a clean and futuristic look. The black camera lenses (#1A1A1A) contrast sharply, drawing the eye and suggesting power and precision. The text and display background incorporate deep indigo (#3B3E5B), soft beige (#D6C7B4), and subtle gradients that blend light and dark tones seamlessly. These colors work together to highlight key features while maintaining a premium, cohesive, and professional appeal.
